name: Mystery of Dalalduhr
description:
A warrior who can't heal, a priest who can't fight, keep them both alive while defeating the waves of monsters who guard the Dragon.

Controls:

WASD  to move
QE to turn
Spacebar or left mouse button to close text

Credits:

DiceBag Plugin by Yagich 

LevelBlock plugin by Reun-Media

Pixel UI Button Icon Platformer Free by BDragon1727
